extensionDescription.message: Users can get a link to the page in the current tab in Scrapbox notation.

copyAllTabsButtonName.description: The name of the button to copy all tabs

copyAllTabsMessage.description: The message shown when all tabs are copied

copyCurrentTabButtonName.description: The name of the button to copy the current tab

copyCurrentTabMessage.description: The message shown when the current tab is copied

copySelectedTabsButtonName.description: The name of the button to copy selected tabs

copySelectedTabsMessage.description: The message shown when selected tabs are copied

contextMenuTitle.description: The title of the context menu

contextMenuQuotationTitle.description: The title of the context menu for quotation

contextMenuOpenHistory.description: The title of the context menu to open clipboard history

sidepanelEmpty.description: The message shown when there is no clipboard history

copiedFeedback.description: The feedback message shown when an item is copied

timeJustNow.description: Time indicator for items copied just now

timeMinutesAgo.description: Time indicator for items copied minutes ago

timeHoursAgo.description: Time indicator for items copied hours ago

timeDaysAgo.description: Time indicator for items copied days ago
